short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces fossil-fuel-related text with absurdity and commentary from speculative fiction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces fossil fuel related terms with absurdity and commentary inspired by speculative fiction.  Science fiction and fantasy have been effective vehicles of social commentary since their beginning. The distance provided by these stories helps to return strangeness to what has become ordinary. This plugin leverages terms from the milieu of speculative fiction in order to bring absurdity, commentary, humor, strangeness, and disbelief to the current state of our fossil fuel economy.

Have an idea?  Add your own words: goo.gl/W23uY1 

Featured in the Select a World exhibition by Simone and Max in Madison, WI.

Support great art.  Donate here: https://www.paypal.me/NLyell
